comments:
1) Open a plugin.xml file.
2) Open the source editor tab.
3) Make a syntax error. For example, insert a random double quote.
4) Save the file. An annotation should appear.
5) Press Alt+Left to go back in the navigation history.
6) Press Alt+Right to go forward in the navigation history. You'll get a warning: "The source page has 
errors. Other pages cannot be used until these errors are corrected."
7) Press OK. A NullPointerException occurs:

java.lang.NullPointerException

538)

we handle this case a bit more gracefully now, you shouldn't see the NPE anymore.
